oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic Agriculture in Albania - Sector Study 2011
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bernet, Thomas
Kazazi, Iris S.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Markets and trade
Albania
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: FiBL, working with local partners, has compiled the facts and figures in a study presenting the organic sector's drivers and determinants. The study is a valuable resource for local stakeholders and interested trading companies.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Swiss Coordination Office in Albania (SCO-A), Research Institute of Organic Agriculture (FiBL) and Ministry of Agriculture, Food and Consumer Production of Albania (MoAFCP)
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Bernet, Thomas and Kazazi, Iris S. (2012) Organic Agriculture in Albania - Sector Study 2011. Swiss Coordination Office in Albania (SCO-A), Research Institute of Organic Agriculture (FiBL) and Ministry of Agriculture, Food and Consumer Production of Albania (MoAFCP), Tirana, Albania.
